name: The Shamrock Ranger
description:
IF YOU PLAYED THE GAME, PLEASE CONSIDER ANSWER THIS SURVEY:

https://forms.gle/mtTPKSRMAX9Tiqgd7

 *Web version coming soon!

THE SHAMROCK RANGER is a 2d action platformer with rouge-like elements. Take the role of the sentai warrior named shamrock ranger and help him destroy the evil that’s planning to take over the world. Your mission? Simple, get to the end goal and use your sword and gun to fight the enemies in your way.

Every time you complete a level you will get evaluated, and if you meet the requirement you will unlock a new ability, try to get every ability available!

But there’s a catch, you only have one life bar and you must finish every stage without dying. At least you maintain your learned abilities for your next run.

 

Keyboard (key binding is available on the menu):

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

J – Slash

K – Shoot

Controller:

Pad – Movement

X / A – Jump

□ / x – Slash

R2 / RB – Shoot

 

 

This is a solodev work, I programed, designed, did the art and the music for this game. This is the first public version of this project and any kind of feedback like comments, bug reports, and the survey is greatly appreciated ;)

This game was made with GameMaker Studio 2.3
